name: AnythingLLM
description: AnythingLLM is an all-in-one AI application for chatting with documents, running AI agents, and leveraging LLMs privately with no complex setup.
longDescription: AnythingLLM is a versatile AI platform designed to enable users to interact with their documents, utilize AI agents, and run large language models (LLMs) locally or in the cloud with a focus on privacy and ease of use. Developed by Mintplex Labs, it eliminates the need for complex infrastructure or extensive technical setup, making AI accessible to both individuals and businesses. The platform supports a wide range of document types, including PDFs, Word documents, and CSVs, allowing users to chat intelligently with their data. It offers both desktop and Docker-based deployment options, ensuring flexibility for local or hosted environments. AnythingLLM also supports multi-user access with fine-grained admin controls and can be white-labeled for enterprise branding. Its mission is to provide a customizable, open-source AI solution that prioritizes user privacy and simplifies AI integration into workflows.
features: Run local LLMs with built-in tools, requiring no complex setup for private AI interactions.
Chat intelligently with various document types like PDFs, Word, and CSVs for enhanced productivity.
Utilize AI agents with no-code builder for powerful automation and custom skill integration.
Support for both open-source and commercial LLMs, offering flexibility in model selection.
Workspace containerization keeps document contexts separate for clean, organized interactions.
Multi-user access with fine-grained admin controls for secure team collaboration.
White-label customization allows businesses to brand the platform with their identity.
Local data storage ensures chats, documents, and models remain private on user devices.
Community Hub enables sharing and discovering extensions for enhanced functionality.
Built-in OCR automatically extracts text from images or non-digitized PDFs for document processing.
Seamless integration with enterprise models from providers like OpenAI, Azure, and AWS.

faqs.question: What is AnythingLLM used for?
faqs.answer: AnythingLLM allows users to chat with documents, run AI agents, and use LLMs privately for tasks like document analysis, automation, and productivity enhancement.

faqs.question: Is AnythingLLM free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, AnythingLLM offers a free desktop version with core features, though some advanced functionalities may require a paid cloud or self-hosted plan.

faqs.question: Can I run AnythingLLM locally?
faqs.answer: Yes, AnythingLLM is designed to run locally by default, storing models, documents, and chats on your device for full privacy.

faqs.question: Does AnythingLLM support multiple users?
faqs.answer: Yes, the cloud and self-hosted versions support multi-user access with isolated workspaces and admin controls for secure collaboration.

faqs.question: What types of documents can I use with AnythingLLM?
faqs.answer: AnythingLLM supports various document formats, including PDFs, Word documents, CSVs, and codebases, for intelligent AI interactions.

faqs.question: Can I customize AnythingLLM for my business?
faqs.answer: Yes, AnythingLLM can be white-labeled and customized with your companyâ€™s branding and tailored user permissions.

faqs.question: Does AnythingLLM require coding knowledge?
faqs.answer: No, AnythingLLM is designed to be no-code, with a user-friendly interface and a no-code agent builder for easy automation.

faqs.question: How does AnythingLLM ensure privacy?
faqs.answer: AnythingLLM stores all data locally by default and allows users to opt out of telemetry, ensuring no data is shared without consent.

faqs.question: Can I integrate external LLMs with AnythingLLM?
faqs.answer: Yes, AnythingLLM supports both open-source and commercial LLMs from providers like OpenAI, Azure, and AWS for flexible integration.
